item.title: S. 220, Southern Idaho Bureau of Reclamation Repayment Act of 2007
item.description: Cost estimate for the bill as ordered reported by the Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Recources on January 31, 2007

item.title: S. 220, Southern Idaho Bureau of Reclamation Repayment Act of 2007
item.description: Cost estimate for the bill as ordered reported by the Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Recources on January 31, 2007

item.text: For further action, see S.2739, which became Public Law 110-229 on 5/8/2008.

summary.text: Southern Idaho Bureau of Reclamation Repayment Act of 2007 - Authorizes any owner of land within the A & B Irrigation District in Idaho to repay at any time the construction costs of District project facilities that are allocated to such land. Provides that, upon full payment of such costs, the parcels shall not be subject to specified ownership and full-cost pricing limitations under federal reclamation law, for which the Secretary shall, upon request, provide the landowner a certificate.

(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)

Southern Idaho Bureau of Reclamation Repayment Act of 2007 - Authorizes any owner of land within the A & B Irrigation District in Idaho to repay at any time the construction costs of District project facilities that are allocated to such land. Provides that, upon full payment of such costs, the parcels shall not be subject to specified ownership and full-cost pricing limitations under federal reclamation law, for which the Secretary shall, upon request, provide the landowner a certificate.

bill.title: Southern Idaho Bureau of Reclamation Repayment Act of 2007

item.title: A bill to authorize early repayment of obligations to the Bureau of Reclamation within the A & B Irrigation District in the State of Idaho.

dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.
dublinCore.dc:contributor: Congressional Research Service, Library of Congress
dublinCore.dc:description: This file contains bill summaries and statuses for federal legislation. A bill summary describes the most significant provisions of a piece of legislation and details the effects the legislative text may have on current law and federal programs. Bill summaries are authored by the Congressional Research Service (CRS) of the Library of Congress. As stated in Public Law 91-510 (2 USC 166 (d)(6)), one of the duties of CRS is "to prepare summaries and digests of bills and resolutions of a public general nature introduced in the Senate or House of Representatives". For more information, refer to the User Guide that accompanies this file.
